comments:
3.0 M2
given:

public class TestA {

	public static void method() {
		System.out.println("TestA.method");
		TestB.method();
	}
}

public class TestB {

	public static void method() {
		System.out.println("TestB.method");
	}
}

1. select method() of TestB
2. refactor rename to 'someothermethod'
